snippet: The death toll from the Ebola epidemic rose to 4,922 out of 10,141 known cases in eight countries through Oct. 23, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Ebola Death Toll Tops 4,900 as Virus Spreads: WHO
headline.main: Ebola Death Toll Tops 4,900 as Virus Spreads: WHO

lead_paragraph: The death toll from the Ebola epidemic rose to 4,922 out of 10,141 known cases in eight countries through Oct. 23, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Saturday.
